com.zberman2.DataManager

Class GUIControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zberman2.DataManager.GUIControl

  • public class GUIControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which controls the GUI Implements the Control part of the Model-View-Control Architecture (in which the model is the master/board, and the view is the GUI itself) Created by Zack Berman on 9/25/2014.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUIControl(Board board, Master master)
      Constructor of a GUI controller Simply creates an empty Move stack, and assigns the board and the master

        master - Master which controls the game

      • handleMove

        public void handleMove(javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> position)
        Method called to handle the situation where a user is moving the currentPiece to a new location
        Parameters:
        position - New space on the board for a piece to move

      • findSource

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Integer> findSource(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Helper method for actionPerformed. Iterates through the spaces and determines which space was clicked on.
        Parameters:
        event - the click of a space
        Returns:
        a (file, rank) pair corresponding to the space

      • light

        public void light(javax.swing.JButton space,
                  boolean highlight)
        Method used to highlight or low-light a space on the board. This is used to indicate which space was clicked on, or which spaces a piece can move to
        Parameters:
        space - Space on the board to be modified
        highlight - If true, brighten space, else, darken space

      • switchSides

        public void switchSides()
        Toggles the current color, and sets the side to that color

      • setCurrentSide

        public void setCurrentSide(int color)
        Makes it so all buttons are not clickable except for the spaces with pieces of a particular color
        Parameters:
        color - Pieces of this color can be clicked on

      • setBoard

        public void setBoard()
        Entry method for resetting the backgrounds and setting the current side
